[Contents]
      4. Extension Modules
        4.5. Module Support Functions

4.5.10. besNEWMORTALDOUBLE

[<<<] [>>>]

Create a new mortal double and return the pointer to it. This macro calls the function memory_NewMortalDouble().

See also

  • besNEWMORTALSTRING
  • besNEWMORTALLONG
  • besNEWMORTALREF
  • besNEWMORTALDOUBLE
  • besNEWMORTALARRAY @end itemize
    [<<<] [>>>]
